title: Potenza S.C.
text:
Potenza Sport Club <a href="Societ%C3%A0%20a%20responsabilit%C3%A0%20limitata">S.r.l.</a> was an Italian <a href="association%20football">football</a> club, based in <a href="Potenza">Potenza</a>, <a href="Basilicata">Basilicata</a>. The club was re-founded in 2004 as A.S. Calcio Potenza, (legal suffix <a href="Societ%C3%A0%20a%20responsabilit%C3%A0%20limitata">S.r.l.</a> was added circa 2005) after the merger of the old A.S.C. Potenza (founded in 1983) and F.C. Potenza (founded in 1919 and previously known as Potenza S.C.), and changed its name to Potenza S.C. in 2006. It inherits the history of the previous "Potenza S.C.". The club was expelled from <a href="2009%E2%80%9310%20Lega%20Pro%20Prima%20Divisione">2009–10 Lega Pro Prima Divisione</a> in mid-season.
History.
Potenza was promoted in <a href="Serie%20C1">Serie C1</a> on 18 June 2007 by beating Benevento over two games in the <a href="2006%E2%80%9307%20Serie%20C2">2006–07 Serie C2</a> promotion playoffs.
Potenza also took part in five <a href="Serie%20B">Serie B</a> seasons from <a href="1963%E2%80%9364%20Serie%20B">1963–64</a> to <a href="1967%E2%80%9368%20Serie%20B">1967–68</a>. The biggest success of her was finishing 5th in Serie B in 1964–65 season.
In March 2010 Potenza was excluded from the <a href="Lega%20Pro%20Prima%20Divisione">Lega Pro Prima Divisione</a> with immediate effect after the club was found guilt of matchfixing regarding a league game against <a href="Salernitana%20Calcio%201919">Salernitana</a> in April 2008. The verdict was partly reverted on appeal, where it was allowed Potenza to complete the season; however, the club will nevertheless appear as last-placed in the final table, thus forcing the club to play in the <a href="Lega%20Pro%20Seconda%20Divisione">Lega Pro Seconda Divisione</a> for the 2010–11 season. In July 2010 the club was excluded by the Italian football federation due to financial problems, and successively admitted into the <a href="Eccellenza">Eccellenza</a> amateur league. However, the club did not participate in any league in 2011–12 season.
